description: This file provides functions to interact with browser local storage for managing user session data and prescription data in a Solana-based health application. It includes functions to load, save, and update session and prescription information stored under specific keys.

methods.name: function safeParse<T>(raw: string | null, fallback: T): T { safeParse
methods.description: Parses a JSON string into a typed object, with fallback on failure or null input.

methods.name: export function loadSession(): Session | null { loadSession
methods.description: Loads the current session object from local storage.

methods.name: export function saveSession(session: Session | null): void { saveSession
methods.description: Saves or clears the session object in local storage.

methods.name: export function loadPrescriptions(): SignedPrescription[] { loadPrescriptions
methods.description: Loads the list of signed prescriptions from local storage.

methods.name: export function savePrescriptions(list: SignedPrescription[]): void { savePrescriptions
methods.description: Saves the list of prescriptions to local storage.

methods.name: export function addPrescription(p: SignedPrescription): void { addPrescription
methods.description: Adds a new prescription to the existing list in local storage.

ctags.name: safeParse
ctags.pattern: /^function safeParse<T>(raw: string | null, fallback: T): T {$/
